metadata.title: CVE-2022-24300 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Minetest before 5.4.0 allows attackers to add or modify arbitrary metafields of the same item stack as saved user input, aka ItemStack metainjection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24300` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

minetest - 5.4.1+repack-2build1
minetest-data - 5.4.1+repack-2build1
minetest-server - 5.4.1+repack-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: minetest package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.1+repack-2build1').
